note: Fictional scenarios with real-world analog tags for calibration against external datasets.

scenarios.title: Cost of Living Brief 001
scenarios.prompt: An advisor proposes a quick win that polls well but may backfire later.

scenarios.title: Crime & Safety Brief 002
scenarios.prompt: An opposition bloc pushes a story that is emotionally potent but thin on evidence.

scenarios.title: Health Capacity Brief 003
scenarios.prompt: Department staff warn the headline narrative and ground data are diverging.

scenarios.title: Education & Culture Brief 004
scenarios.prompt: A donor-funded campaign is steering public anger toward a symbolic target.

scenarios.title: Climate & Disaster Brief 005
scenarios.prompt: A whistleblower packet lands on your desk hours before the nightly news cycle.

scenarios.title: Corruption & Lobbying Brief 006
scenarios.prompt: Regional mayors demand immediate action while treasury warns of long-run drag.

scenarios.title: Tech & Surveillance Brief 007
scenarios.prompt: A viral clip reframes a complex issue into a binary loyalty test.

scenarios.title: Labour & Industry Brief 008
scenarios.prompt: Business groups and unions both claim your current plan is unfair to them.

scenarios.title: Identity & Culture Brief 009
scenarios.prompt: Frontline workers report a solvable issue that media actors are weaponizing.

scenarios.title: Foreign Pressure Brief 010
scenarios.prompt: A quiet technical failure is becoming a major narrative battle.
